SummaryEnglish: Live action series based on the manga "Rent-a-Girlfriend".
Aliases: 彼女、お借りします (ドラマ)

1.SummaryEnglish: Kinoshita Kazuya (Onishi Ryusei), an idiot, scumbag and unpopular college student, tries to heal the emotional wounds of being dumped by his first girlfriend, Nanami Asami (Akita Shiori). apply to. Then, his ideal girlfriend, Chizuru Mizuhara (Hiyori Sakurada), who is good-looking, good-looking, and caring, arrives! In response, Kazuya unintentionally attacks Chizuru...! Kazuya reveals his lame true feelings, and an unexpected development unfolds in the "rental" love story!?

2.SummaryEnglish: Kazuya Kinoshita (Ryusei Onishi), who has decided never to see Chizuru Mizuhara (Hiyori Sakurada) again, starts a virgin campus life with his ex-girlfriend Mami Nanami (Shiori Akita). Ya unexpectedly runs into Chizuru on the university campus! However, Chizuru's outfit was plain and inconspicuous, unimaginable from the time she was a rental girl! ? Chizuru, who wants to hide his rental girlfriend's part-time job, and Kazuya, who relies on rental girlfriend and doesn't want her black history to be known, have the same interests. The two agree to stay as complete strangers. However, when Kazuya returns to the apartment where he is lodging, Chizuru, who for some reason is plainly dressed, is in the next room. Surprisingly, the two were next-door neighbors in the apartment! ! ! A few days later, Kazuya's grandmother, Kazu (Kino Hana), visits Kazuya's room.

3.SummaryEnglish: Kazuya Kinoshita (Ryusei Onishi) gets completely drunk at a drinking party where his ex-girlfriend Asami Nanami (Shiori Akita) and rental girlfriend Chizuru Mizuhara (Hiyori Sakurada) are together. As she gets older, she becomes aware of her strong regrets and becomes unable to suppress her sexual desires. However, as soon as he heard Asami say bad things about Chizuru, he took Chizuru's shoulder and scolded Asami. Her favorite is Asami, but she doesn't want to hurt Chizuru. Later, when Kazuya goes to the beach with his university friends, including Asami, he encounters Chizuru in plain "Ichinose" clothes. Fortunately, no one realizes that Ichinose is Kazuya's girlfriend, Chizuru Mizuhara, but Kazuya, who was excited by Asami in a swimsuit and was determined to check Asami's feelings today, panicked. As a result, Kazuya pulls Chizuru into a private room in the bathroom, but Asami arrives and opens the door...! ?

4.SummaryEnglish: While on a trip with college friends, Kinoshita Kazuya (Onishi Ryusei) is suddenly kissed by his ex-girlfriend Nanami Asami (Akita Shiori). Asami buries her face in Kazuya's chest, saying, "I can't stand it anymore." In Kazuya's mind, unable to move due to the shock, the thoughts of Asami, who he once decided to be his "fated person," vividly revive. Kazuya hides his turmoil and returns to Chizuru Mizuhara (Hiyori Sakurada) group. Then, in a punishment game, I feel like I'm going to be forced to kiss Chizuru! I can't do that in front of Asami. However, Chizuru, who has a high level of professionalism as her rental girlfriend, quietly closes her eyes towards Kazuya. Chizuru's lips approached little by little. Kazuya desperately thinks of a way to settle the situation. And Kazuya, who has made up his mind, finally speaks those words. However, when Yoshiaki Kibe (Shunya Kaneko) hears this, he suddenly attacks Kazuya...! ?

5.SummaryEnglish: Kazuya Kinoshita (Ryusei Onishi) jumps into the sea to save Chizuru Mizuhara (Hiyori Sakurada) who has fallen from a pleasure boat, and manages to rescue her. However, he himself lost consciousness. For Kazuya's sake, Chizuru gives him a heart massage and artificial respiration. Thanks to that, Kazuya regains his consciousness safely, but Kazuya's feelings are confused again when Chizuru, who is a customer, even performs artificial respiration. Even though the time for the two to terminate their contract is getting closer and closer, Kazuya, who recalls the events since he met Chizuru one by one, finally realizes his true feelings of "non-returnable". …. Meanwhile, Kazuya is introduced to her by her friend Shun Kuribayashi (Kosuke Suzuki). Ruka Sarashina (Mio Kudo), Shun's girlfriend whom he meets for the first time, is a beautiful girl as beautiful as Chizuru, but Kazuya recognizes her face...

6.SummaryEnglish: Ruka Sarashina (Mio Kudo), who sees that Chizuru Mizuhara (Hiyori Sakurada) is a rental girlfriend, asks Chizuru, who continues to take the attitude of a real lover, to kiss Kinoshita Kazuya (Onishi Ryusei)! For both Kazuya's sake and myself, I absolutely want to avoid having Ruka reveal the truth to Kuribayashi Shun (Suzuki Kosuke). Thinking that, Chizuru puts her hand on Kazuya's cheek, which shows her impatience, and kisses her lips... After that, Kazuya, who is nervous about when Shun will tell her, secretly follows Ruka after the double date. However, Ruka ambushed Kazuya. Kazuya has no words to respond to her accusation, "Are you going to be a stalker after pretending to be a lover?" Still, Kazuya, who wants a pledge from Ruka not to disperse to her surroundings, continues to seriously bow his head knowing her selfishness. Ruka leaves Kazuya with shocking words and runs off...!

7.SummaryEnglish: Ruka Sarashina (Mio Kudo) confesses to Kazuya Kinoshita (Ryusei Onishi), but he refuses without lying about his feelings for Chizuru Mizuhara (Hiyori Sakurada). To such two people, Ruka presents an exchange condition that "She will keep quiet that Chizuru is a rental girlfriend if she does it." Ruka had a reason for her to fall in love with Kazuya, but for Kazuya, it was nothing more than a threat. However, he can't leave Ruka who breaks down in tears without hesitation in her eyes, and Ruka becomes Kazuya's "girlfriend (provisional)"! In order to prevent Ruka from getting serious and Chizuru's identity to be exposed, the trial relationship is extremely harsh. In order to avoid being “lover-like” with Ruka as much as possible, Kazuya lies and refuses her invitation to a fireworks display. On the day of the fireworks display, Kazuya sees Chizuru in town. Fashionable Chizuru joins handsome. Is the man a business partner or...?

8.SummaryEnglish: Ruka Sarashina (Mio Kudo) jumps into her heart and says, “I can’t stand it anymore!” Kazuya Kinoshita (Ryusei Onishi) pushes Ruka down, as if to say that he is the one who can’t stand it…! Imagine such a scene. In reality, Ruka manages to hold on, but unlike her rental girlfriend, Chizuru Mizuhara (Hiyori Sakurada), who can't cross the line, she sneaks up on Kazuya, saying that she's ready to have sex... ! On the other hand, Chizuru invites Kazuya to the veranda at night instead of work. Kazuya is obsessed with a naughty delusion with Chizuru, this time with a different development. However, Chizuru unexpectedly asks him to rent a certain woman. When Kazuya listens to her wish and heads to the meeting place, there is a transcendent beautiful girl again! However, she has a personality that is not suitable for rental...! ?

9.SummaryEnglish: Kazuya Kinoshita (Ryusei Onishi) was told by Chizuru Mizuhara (Hiyori Sakurada) that he was thinking of quitting his rental girlfriend. Although he is depressed, he is prepared to say goodbye to Chizuru soon, and decides to face Ruka Sarashina (Mio Kudo) seriously in order to create her true girlfriend so that her grandmother will not be sad if Chizuru is gone. Kazuya rediscovers the bright and dedicated charm of Ruka when he goes on a date like a lover, which he has avoided until now. Chizuru crossed my mind many times along with the question, "Why is this girl no good...?" At that moment, Kazuya sees Chizuru and Nanami Asami (Akita Shiori) entering a room in the box! ? Kazuya ignores his confession to Ruka and tries to find out how the two of them are doing...

10.SummaryEnglish: Kazuya Kinoshita (Ryusei Onishi) is suddenly asked by Asami Nanami (Shiori Akita) to pretend to be her boyfriend and meet her parents. Unable to let go of his ex-girlfriend, who seems to have some circumstances behind him, he decides to cancel his previous rental date with Mizuhara Chizuru (Sakurada Hiyori). Knowing it or not, Asami goes to Chizuru and she advises him not to interfere with her relationship with Kazuya. On the day of the appointment, when Kazuya goes out to dinner with Asami's parents as a fake boyfriend, Chizuru happens to be serving customers at the restaurant! Kazuya is nervous about Asami's strict-looking father, but keeps an eye on Chizuru's movements so that he won't be noticed. The situation looks different from the usual Chizuru. In fact, Chizuru was dealing with a customer with an excuse due to a mistake by her dispatch company. On the other hand, Chizuru, who left the store first, was approaching a certain danger.
